titleStmt.title: A treatise of sacramental convenanting with Christ shewing the ungodly their contempt of Christ, in their contempt of the Sacremental covenant : and calling them (not to a profanation of this holy ordnanice [sic], but) to an understanding, serious, entire dedication of themselves to God in the sacramental covenant, and a believing commemoration of the death of Christ / by M.M.
titleStmt.author: Rawlet, John, 1642-1686.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Rawlet by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
